title: 111_hr3985
content: Second Generation Biofuel Producer Tax Credit Act of 2009 - Amends Internal Revenue Code provisions relating to the cellulosic biofuel producer tax credit to: (1) revise the applicable amount of such credit by linking it to the British thermal unit (BTU) content of second generation biofuels as determined by the Secretary of the Treasury. (2) expand the definition of qualified feedstock to include any cultivated algae, cyanobacteria, or lemna. (3) exclude from the definition of second generation biofuel certain fuel produced from coprocessing with nonqualified feedstocks and certain unprocessed fuels. (4) require producers of second generation biofuels to register with the Secretary. And (5) allow an additional depreciation allowance for property used to produce second generation biofuel.
